ygData.subject: O/T I'll probably get flamed for this by some, but..
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve been looking at some .mpg s of the up-coming Asheron s Call, and have been wondering people s thoughts and opinions of this new online rpg is?  I know
ygData.messageBody:
I've been looking at some .mpg's of the up-coming Asheron's Call, and
have been wondering people's thoughts and opinions of this new online rpg
is? I know lots of you are die-hard EQ fans and I'm not meaning to step on
your toes with this, but Asheron's Call looks mighty decent and sports
better graphics -- to an extent, at least, with things such as blowing
leaves. But the thing I'm mostly interested in is the world. I've been to
the web sites, but of course they're only going to give you a one-sided view
of things.

Thanks folks,
~Mysk

Oh, and... Impart Strength is a good idea with your skelly. I gives an okay
boost to strength and it certainly does help to counter the weak pets. Just
remember to click on it and cancel if your pet falls and you have to go hand
to hand. No sense in going at it weaker than you already are. :-)
